templates.template: <form class="approve_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="Approve"></input> <input type="image" alt="Approve Button" title="Approve" src="%IMAGE_DIR%/btn-approve.gif"></input> </form>

<form class="unapprove_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="Unapprove"></input> <input type="image" alt="Unapprove Button" title="Unapprove" src="%IMAGE_DIR%/btn-unapprove.gif"></input> </form>

<form class="reject_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="Reject"></input> <input type="image" alt="Reject Button" title="Reject" src="%IMAGE_DIR%/btn-delete.gif"></input> </form>

<form class="edit_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="Edit"></input> <input type="image" alt="Edit Button" title="Edit" src="%IMAGE_DIR%/btn-edit.gif"></input> </form>

<form class="remove_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="Remove"></input> <input type="image" alt="Remove Button" title="Remove" src="%IMAGE_DIR%/btn-delete.gif"></input> </form>
